channel.title: Happy birthday John!
channel.description:
A bit of a different community post this one, but on Saturday we celebrated the birthday of our very own developer, @John_Askew !
John is a tireless worker that has poured a lot of effort all over our tools during the past year and brings a great daily deal of joy and fun to all of us in the Tech Team! And last but not least, he's the Friday in-house doughnut master!
Please join me in wishing John a very happy birthday and a great week off!
Happy birthday again John, we're truly blessed to have you!

item.title: Happy birthday John!
item.dc:creator: Michelle_IOM
item.description:
Bonne Anniversaire John. I hope you aren’t reading this while you are off for the week. Thanks for all you do to keep the standard and tools working.

Read full topic
